ExampleSentences.Sentence: They want to take us back to the dark days of ignorance and superstition.
ExampleSentences.Translation: (Chcą nas cofnąć w mroczne dni ignorancji i zabobonów.)

ExampleSentences.Sentence: You're a community of people with a common superstition.
This school of thought is bordering on outright superstition.
ExampleSentences.Translation: (Ta szkoła filozoficzna bliska jest zwyczajnemu zabobonowi.)
